column1: #Text=—The committee of police commissioners appointed in April last, to take preliminary steps for the erection of a spacious covered market, recommend the area nearly opposite to the church, and the land occupied by buildings extending from Greaves-street to Mill-street, as a suitable site.

#Text=An act of parliament will be necessary to authorise the erection of the new market; and it is estimated that the total cost, including the purchase of the property on the site, will not fall short of about £16,000.
#Text=The Oldham Ringers formally opened the peal of twelve bells in the tower of Oldham church on Monday last.
#Text=The occurrence excited considerable interest, and there was a numerous atten lance of ringers, from the Collegiate Church and St.
#Text=A variety of scientific peals were rung by parties from these places, as well as by the Oldham senior and junior societies of ringers.
